name: Renatus
description:
You get stronger when you die About

This is a game made for the Brakeys 2023.1 game jam. This is my second time completing a game jam and I am really happy that I managed to complete the game on time. The game is based around the theme "an end is a new beginning". When the player dies they comeback stronger. I haven't used unity or any other game engine in a year so I was really rusty going into this game jam (~_~;) lol. Due to time constraints the enemy AI is very basic I would have liked to implement more mechanics such as dashing, invulnerability, a boss fight, etc but I had limited free time to work on the game  ( ꒦ິ﹏ ꒦ິ ).  In the future I would like to come back and work on this project more.  Overall, I am just happy that I managed to complete the game on time!

╰(▔∀▔)╯ Thanks for playing! How to play:
  • WASD to move
  • You can hold left click to shoot bullets
  • Enemy bullets are destructible and its encouraged to shoot them before they end up killing you
  • When you die gain speed and faster bullets but with less hearts than before
Tips:
  • Destroying enemies that spawn bullets faster is key to winning
  • Kill ghosts and skeletons first
  • Dont stop moving
